channels.moreDesc: Google is where people search for what to do, where to go and what to buy. Your business can appear on Google whenever someone is looking for products or services like yours.

More and more customers search for a business with Google Maps on mobile; so you should consider listing your business on Google Maps as another way to optimize your Local SEO. And having the correct Google Business Listing in place ensures that your potential customers are up-to-date with your business hours and contact information.
Marketing your business on Facebook can help you communicate with your customers directly and reach out to other users who are already on the platform.

When you set up a Shop through your business’ Facebook Page, your products start appearing in the Facebook Marketplace, allowing many more potential customers to discover your business and buy your products.

With 1.5 billion users, 1 billion of whom are active daily, it’s more than likely your audience will be using WhatsApp on a regular basis. With WhatsApp Business, you can be readily available to customers and quickly respond to messages and enquiries.
Twitter gives you access to a large audience base. You can communicate with your followers to build brand awareness and reach out to new customers right from Boost.

details.title: Website optimised for best experience of your patients
details.desc: The internet is the first place that people go to when they want to explore treatment options. A detailed and well-structured website helps in establishing trust in your practice. Boost can help you create an attractive and well-designed website to impress patients and visitors. The site is mobile responsive, which means that people can read it both on their smartphones as well as laptops.

details.title: Appointment bookings & enquiries
details.desc: Boost has many useful features such as end-to-end appointment bookings, enquiry facility etc. to assist your business. Doctors and healthcare specialists can use these features to see more patients and increase their efficiency.

details.title: Pre-installed payment gateway
details.desc: Now your patients can book appointments and pay the fees online using whatever method they choose. We offer a safe and reliable payments gateway which is well-equipped handle all popular modes of transaction. The system is fast, easy to operate, and provides a pleasant user experience.

details.title: Upgrade to a Custom Domain
details.desc: When you create a Boost website, it is built using our domain name. But you also have the chance to create your own custom domain. Having a website with a custom domain name increases trust and makes your business look more professional. All you need to do to get your own domain name is let us know that you want to upgrade!

details.title: End-to-end appointment management
details.desc: At Boost, we try to help doctors and healthcare specialists grow their business using the latest digital technologies. With this in mind, we have created a completely automated system to help your patients book their medical appointments online. Our system takes care of the entire booking process including scheduling appointments and making online payments.

details.title: Two-way appointment reminders
details.desc: Patients who miss their appointments cause financial loss to your business. That’s why we have built an appointment reminder feature. It makes sure your patients never forget about an upcoming appointment. You can cut down your losses due to patient absence and no-shows.

details.title: Online service enquiry
details.desc: Your Boost website has an Enquiry button through which patients can contact you. They can use the button to drop a question about your services, facilities, timings etc. This makes it easier for visitors to reach out to you.

details.title: Reply to patients enquiries instantly
details.desc: The system will inform you immediately after a visitor drops a query. You can use the details provided by them in the message to reply back. Responding promptly to queries increases the chance of the patient choosing you over other healthcare providers. It provides you with a golden opportunity to increase market share.

details.title: Manage unlimited enquiries & appointments
details.desc: There is no limit to the number of appointments and enquiries that can be created. The system is also designed to prevent double bookings. Patients can make an appointment only as per available time slots. This helps avoid clashes over timing.

details.title: HIPAA - compliant data centres
details.desc: At Boost, we take issues like patient confidentiality and data security very seriously. That is why we ensure that our security standards match up to global norms. Our data centres are fully compliant with the US Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (HIPAA) which sets the standards for patient-doctor confidentiality. This ensures that all patient details remain secure with us.

details.title: Modern encryption technology
details.desc: We keep your data safe using the latest and most advanced encryption technology. Our high encryption levels of up to 256-bit are designed protect sensitive information belonging to you and your patients. No need to worry about data security!

details.title: Ready to use payment gateway
details.desc: Collecting payments has never been easier! Boost comes with a pre-installed payments system which allows you to receive money for online appointment bookings. Enjoy using a fast, simple, secure and error-free payments system marketed under our own brand name to receive money safely from your consumers.

details.title: Supports All payment modes
details.desc: Our payment system supports all types of transactions. We accept and validate internet payments via credit card, debit card, netbanking, and all popular UPIs. Whatever methods your customers choose, we are well-equipped to handle it.

details.title: Secure PCI DSS-compliant payment gateway
details.desc: We try very hard to ensure that money is safe and no sensitive data like bank account number, OTP etc. is leaked during a transaction. We follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) which is a set of international guidelines to ensure the safety of card payments. In this way, we use advanced technology to protect you and your patients from data theft and fraud.

details.title: Payment reaches your account within 10 working days
details.desc: We refund the amount immediately to the patient in case of cancelled appointments. To enable this process to function smoothly, we hold the money in an escrow account for 10 working days after the patient has made the payment. Your money is totally safe with us and will be transferred to your bank account after the expiry of this period. This is done to create a fair, safe and transparent experience for both you and the patient.

details.title: Update your website & social media from any location
details.desc: One of the biggest advantages of using Boost is that it makes managing your website and social media accounts totally easy! You can post updates from any location simply using your smartphone! No need for an office or a computer! Put up notices, updates, health tips etc. even while outside or travelling. Never lose touch with the digital side of your business when you have the power of Boost in your pocket!

details.title: Put up unlimited images
details.desc: At Boost, we understand the power that pictures bring to marketing. That’s why we provide all our members with an unlimited picture gallery. Increase patient footfall by uploading relevant pictures of your clinic/practice. Use the power of images to get more patients to reach out to you.

details.title: Showcase up to 10 different services
details.desc: Inform your patients about services offered by showcasing up to 10 different items. Mention price, description etc. to notify your audience about the most popular options. Grow your practice by using the power of Boost to the fullest!

details.title: Display up to 50 updates/offers/blogs
details.desc: Inform your patients about services offered by showcasing up to 10 different items. Mention price, description etc. to notify your audience about the most popular options. Grow your practice by using the power of Boost to the fullest!

details.title: Advice on digital growth strategy
details.desc: Ria, your digital assistant, will be providing suggestions on how to improve your website. RIA stands for Relationship Intelligence Agent which is an AI-based technology. Its job is to help you with your digital strategy. Recommendations from Ria are different for every member and are made after analysing each business separately.

details.title: Weekly performance reporting
details.desc: Boost gives a complete picture of your online business through a variety of data and statistics. Find information on the number of unique visitors, patient enquiries, bookings, call logs, and more. Check your ROI on a weekly basis to ensure everything is on the right track.

details.title: Content tips
details.desc: Besides helping you with your overall digital strategy, Ria will also provide tips on content strategy. You will get messages and reminders telling you what you can do to improve your website and social media presence. These tips will help you create better content which can result in higher patient footfall.

Grow your business and improve efficiency using our unique digital platform.

details.title: Upgrade to a custom domain
details.desc: When you create a Boost website, it is built using our domain name. But you also have the chance to create your own custom domain. Having a website with a custom domain name increases customer trust and makes your business look more professional. All you need to do to get your own domain name is let us know that you want to upgrade!

details.title: High speed & secure website
details.desc: All our websites are equipped with top-grade security features such as SSL certificates. SSL certificates ensure that the information you send on the internet is completely encrypted. Websites without SSL certificates run the risk of having their data/information stolen. There is no such risk with Boost which comes with a reliable SSL certificate and other important safety features to assist your retail business.

details.title: Booking management
details.desc: These days, hotels and motels need online booking facility to compete strongly with their rivals. That is why Boost for hotels comes with a readymade booking engine. Now your guests can make reservations from the website itself. No need to call the hotel! Our booking system provides end-to-end inventory management to help you with your business.

details.title: Online enquiries
details.desc: Every Boost website comes with an Enquiry button to allow visitors to leave questions regarding food, services, accommodation etc. This makes it easier for your customers to contact you. It brings business leads and gives you the chance to increase your occupancy rates.

details.title: Reply to customer enquiries instantly
details.desc: The system will inform you immediately after a visitor drops a query. You can use the details provided by them in the message to reply back. Responding promptly to customer queries increases their chance of choosing you over your competitors. It provides you with a golden opportunity to increase market share.

details.title: Manage unlimited enquiries & reservations
details.desc: There is no limit to the number of enquiries and reservations that can be created. The system also comes with inbuilt protection against double bookings. Customers can only choose from available days/slots. This helps avoid clashes over scheduling.

details.title: Automated inventory management with one point of control
details.desc: Hotels need to list themselves on travel portals like TripAdvisor, MakeMyTrip etc. to increase bookings and reservations. This brings the problem of managing multiple channels. We provide our members with a dedicated channel manager to help them tackle the problem. If you’ve listed your hotel across multiple booking sites, this facility can definitely make life easier for you.

details.title: Location & Places of Interest
details.desc: Customers want to be near the city’s main attractions and also close to transportation. This feature helps your customers find attractions around your hotel and explore the area. It can be an important tool to highlight your locational advantages and draw in more customers.

details.title: Ready to use payment gateway
details.desc: Collecting payments has never been easier! Boost comes with a pre-installed payments system which allows you to receive money for online appointment bookings. Enjoy using a fast, simple, secure and error-free payments system marketed under our own brand name to receive money safely from your consumers.

details.title: Supports All payment modes
details.desc: Our payment system supports all types of transactions. We accept and validate internet payments via credit card, debit card, netbanking, and all popular UPIs. Whatever methods your customers choose, we are well-equipped to handle it.

details.title: Secure PCI DSS-compliant payment gateway
details.desc: We try very hard to ensure that money is safe and no sensitive data like bank account number, OTP etc. is leaked during a transaction. We follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) which is a set of international guidelines to ensure the safety of card payments. In this way, we use advanced technology to protect you and your patients from data theft and fraud.

details.title: Payment reaches your account within 10 working days
details.desc: We refund the amount immediately to the patient in case of cancelled appointments. To enable this process to function smoothly, we hold the money in an escrow account for 10 working days after the patient has made the payment. Your money is totally safe with us and will be transferred to your bank account after the expiry of this period. This is done to create a fair, safe and transparent experience for both you and the patient.

details.title: Update your website & social media from any location
details.desc: One of the biggest advantages of using Boost is that it makes managing your website and social media accounts totally easy! You can post updates from any location simply using your smartphone! No need for an office or a computer! Put up offers/discounts, updates, wellness tips, membership options etc. even while outside or travelling. Never lose touch with the digital side of your business when you have the power of Boost in your pocket!

details.title: Put up unlimited images
details.desc: At Boost, we understand the power that pictures bring to marketing. That’s why we provide all our members with an unlimited picture gallery. Increase bookings by uploading attractive pictures of your spa/wellness centre. Use the power of images to persuade more customers to reach out to you!

details.title: Showcase up to 10 different services
details.desc: Inform visitors about your facilities and services by showcasing up to 10 different items. Mention features, prices etc. to give details about the most popular options. Grow your business by using the power of Boost to the fullest!

details.title: Display up to 50 updates/offers/blogs
details.desc: Boost allows you to display up to 50 different updates/offers/blogs on the website. And, the uploading process is amazingly quick and easy! All you need to do is log on to the app/website and hit a few buttons. Boost makes managing your website and social media accounts simple and effortless, saving you time and money.

details.title: Advice on digital growth strategy
details.desc: Ria, your digital assistant, will be providing suggestions on how to improve your website. RIA stands for Relationship Intelligence Agent which is an AI-based technology. Its job is to help you with your digital strategy. Recommendations from Ria are different for every member and are made after analysing each business separately.

details.title: Weekly performance reporting
details.desc: Boost gives a complete picture of your online business through a variety of data and statistics. Find information on the number of unique visitors, customer enquiries, bookings, call logs, and more. Check your ROI on a weekly basis to ensure everything is on the right track.

details.title: Content Tips
details.desc: Besides helping you with your overall digital strategy, Ria will also provide tips on content strategy. You will get messages and reminders telling you what you can do to improve your website and social media presence. These tips will help you create better content which can result in higher leads and bookings.

channels.moreDesc: Google is where people search for what to do, where to go and what to buy. Your business can appear on Google whenever someone is looking for products or services like yours.

More and more customers search for a business with Google Maps on mobile; so you should consider listing your business on Google Maps as another way to optimize your Local SEO. And having the correct Google Business Listing in place ensures that your potential customers are up-to-date with your business hours and contact information.
Marketing your business on Facebook can help you communicate with your customers directly and reach out to other users who are already on the platform.

When you set up a Shop through your business’ Facebook Page, your products start appearing in the Facebook Marketplace, allowing many more potential customers to discover your business and buy your products.

With 1.5 billion users, 1 billion of whom are active daily, it’s more than likely your audience will be using WhatsApp on a regular basis. With WhatsApp Business, you can be readily available to customers and quickly respond to messages and enquiries.
Twitter gives you access to a large audience base. You can communicate with your followers to build brand awareness and reach out to new customers right from Boost.

details.title: Automatic optimisation for search
details.desc: The business website enabled via Boost, automatically optimises the digital content for it to get organically discovered on search engines. This let's you focus on your content quality, and not worry about any search engine optimisations.

details.title: Pre-installed payment gateway for online orders
details.desc: Thinking of offering your menu online? Go right ahead! Now your customers can make online payments using any method they choose through a pre-installed payment system. Offer online food ordering and receive cash digitally via a fast and reliable payments gateway.

details.title: Online reservations
details.desc: Boost helps you grow your restaurant business through the power of digital technology. Many guests prefer to book a table in advance and don’t like to wait for seating. Boost helps them make a reservation online without the need to call the restaurant. It makes bookings much simpler and helps you keep your seats filled.

details.title: Takeaways & deliveries
details.desc: Accepting online orders can help you grow your revenue and attract new customers. It also encourages larger orders by giving your customers more time to look through the menu and discover new items they would like to try. Boost has a pre-integrated online ordering system that helps restaurants and cafes cater to takeaways and deliveries.

details.title: Add management profiles

details.title: Showcase your products
details.desc: Potential clients want to see evidence of work before they do business with a company. Online brochures send the subtle message that your business is professional, reliable, and committed to quality. Boost allows you to build an active product portfolio that showcases your best creations complete with detailed information on each item.

This is done to create a fair, safe and transparent experience for both you and the patient.

details.title: Advice on digital growth strategy
details.desc: Ria, your digital assistant, will be providing suggestions on how to improve your website. RIA stands for Relationship Intelligence Agent which is an AI-based technology. Its job is to help you with your digital strategy. Recommendations from Ria are different for every member and are made after analysing each business separately.

details.title: Weekly Performance Reporting
details.desc: Boost gives a complete picture of your online business through a variety of data and statistics. Find information on the number of unique visitors, customer enquiries, bookings, call logs, and more. Check your ROI on a weekly basis to ensure everything is on the right track.

details.title: Content Tips
details.desc: Besides helping you with your overall digital strategy, Ria will also provide tips on content strategy. You will get messages and reminders telling you what you can do to improve your website and social media presence. These tips will help you create better content which can result in higher leads and bookings.

channels.moreDesc: Google is where people search for what to do, where to go and what to buy. Your business can appear on Google whenever someone is looking for products or services like yours.

More and more customers search for a business with Google Maps on mobile; so you should consider listing your business on Google Maps as another way to optimize your Local SEO. And having the correct Google Business Listing in place ensures that your potential customers are up-to-date with your business hours and contact information.
Marketing your business on Facebook can help you communicate with your customers directly and reach out to other users who are already on the platform.

When you set up a Shop through your business’ Facebook Page, your products start appearing in the Facebook Marketplace, allowing many more potential customers to discover your business and buy your products.

With 1.5 billion users, 1 billion of whom are active daily, it’s more than likely your audience will be using WhatsApp on a regular basis. With WhatsApp Business, you can be readily available to customers and quickly respond to messages and enquiries.
Twitter gives you access to a large audience base. You can communicate with your followers to build brand awareness and reach out to new customers right from Boost.

details.title: Automatic optimisation for search
details.desc: The business website enabled via Boost, automatically optimises the digital content for it to get organically discovered on search engines. This let's you focus on your content quality, and not worry about any search engine optimisations.

details.title: Pre-installed payment gateway for online orders
details.desc: Thinking of offering your services online? Go right ahead! Now your customers can make online payments using any method they choose through a pre-installed payment system. Offer your services online and receive cash digitally via a fast and reliable payments gateway.

details.title: Upgrade to a custom domain
details.desc: When you create a Boost website, it is built using our domain name. But you also have the chance to create your own custom domain. Having a website with a custom domain name increases customer trust and makes your business look more professional. All you need to do to get your own domain name is let us know that you want to upgrade!

details.title: High speed & secure website
details.desc: All our websites are equipped with top-grade security features such as SSL certificates. SSL certificates ensure that the information you send on the internet is completely encrypted. Websites without SSL certificates run the risk of having their data/information stolen. There is no such risk with Boost which comes with a reliable SSL certificate and other important safety features to assist your retail business.

details.title: Update your website & social media from any location
details.desc: One of the biggest advantages of using Boost is that it makes managing your website and social media accounts totally easy! You can post information from any location simply using your smartphone! Put up information regarding offers/discounts, updates, events etc. even while outdoors or travelling. Never lose touch with the digital side of your business when you have the power of Boost in your pocket!

details.title: Upload unlimited images
details.desc: At Boost, we understand the power that pictures bring to marketing. That’s why we provide all our members with an unlimited picture gallery. Increase your sales and income by uploading attractive pictures of your service/products. Use the power of images to attract more customers to your business.

details.title: Showcase up to 10 different services
details.desc: Inform visitors about your facilities and services by showcasing up to 10 different items. Mention features, prices etc. to give details about the most popular options. Grow your business by using the power of Boost to the fullest!

details.title: Display up to 50 updates/offers/blogs
details.desc: Boost allows you to display up to 50 different updates/offers/blogs on the website. And, the uploading process is amazingly quick and easy! All you need to do is log on to the app/website and hit a few buttons. Boost makes managing your website and social media accounts simple and effortless, saving you time and money.

details.title: Ready to use payment gateway
details.desc: Collecting payments has never been easier! Boost comes with a pre-installed payments system which allows you to receive money for online appointment bookings. Enjoy using a fast, simple, secure and error-free payments system marketed under our own brand name to receive money safely from your consumers.

details.title: Supports All payment modes
details.desc: Our payment system supports all types of transactions. We accept and validate internet payments via credit card, debit card, netbanking, and all popular UPIs. Whatever methods your customers choose, we are well-equipped to handle it.

details.title: Secure PCI DSS-compliant payment gateway
details.desc: We try very hard to ensure that money is safe and no sensitive data like bank account number, OTP etc. is leaked during a transaction. We follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) which is a set of international guidelines to ensure the safety of card payments. In this way, we use advanced technology to protect you and your patients from data theft and fraud.

details.title: Payment reaches your account within 10 working days
details.desc: We refund the amount immediately to the patient in case of cancelled appointments. To enable this process to function smoothly, we hold the money in an escrow account for 10 working days after the patient has made the payment. Your money is totally safe with us and will be transferred to your bank account after the expiry of this period. This is done to create a fair, safe and transparent experience for both you and the patient.
